productShortDescription:
'There is more than one side to everything'

With that idea in mind this shirt was designed in such a way that every angle of the garment is unique. By using three different fabrics, each with its unique pattern, the shirt has a both casual as well as a 'street' look. To enhance that look, a loose fit was created which intertwines with Rolann's brand identity and makes for a comfortable and one of a kind item.
fit:
Loose fit.

Male model: 1.83 and wears size L
Female model: 1.78 and wears size L
production: The garments are handmade by experienced men with a refugee background who are motivated to build a new life in Holland.
additionalNotes: Using our premium quality fabrics, combined with a loose fit, we designed an ultimately comfortable yet stylish piece.
